alert.note: Alert for Garrard; Jessamine (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 18 at 9:19PM EST until February 20 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Kentucky... Kentucky River at Ford Lock affecting Madison and Clark Counties. Kentucky River at Camp Nelson Lock affecting Garrard and Jessamine Counties. .Heavy rain from Wednesday night and Thursday is causing the river to rise. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT TO MONDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Kentucky River at Camp Nelson Lock. * WHEN...From late tonight to Monday evening. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:15 PM EST Saturday the stage was 30.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 30.9 feet Sunday evening. - Flood stage is 30.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Stay tuned to NOAA Weather Radio and your local media for the latest information. If you are affected by these crests take any necessary actions. Additional information is available at water.weather.gov/ahps2/index. php?wfo=lmk Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/lmk. The next statement will be issued Sunday morning.
